verse:
ज्ञाज्ञौ द्वावजावीशनीशावजा ह्येका भोक्तृभोग्यार्थयुक्ता।
अनन्तश्चात्मा विश्वरूपो ह्यकर्ता त्रयं यदा विन्दते ब्रह्ममेतत्‌॥
meaning: There are 3 types of Brahm, first all knowing God and second the little knower jeev both of them are unborn eternal.The all knower god is ruler and the little knower jeev is ruled by him. The other brahm is maya the one one that gets experienced by the jeev the experiencer. There are infinite such jeev and the whole world is made of this 3 brahm and God is un-doer, the self shall knows/realizes these three, that is the knowledge of the all knowing God, the maya(experienced) and the jeev(experiencer)
